divs: sighting detailsi was walking from a dinner.it was about 8.40 pm i saw some kids jumping up and down pointing in the sky. i looked up and saw about 8 or 9 big glowing orange globes all connected by the structure that was mostly covered by the clouds it was aprox 1500 ft in the sky heading north.it was huge about the size of a football field. no sound smells or temp change. there were quite a few people out in their yards looking at it. a man told me that there was another one that showed up about 20 min before so im guessing there was 2 i could not get a picture of it as i did not have anything at the time to record the event. to day i saw on youtube that the iss tracked something leaving the atmosphere around 1am my time zone. please let me know what can be done to confirm this event. thanks for your time -[name of witness deleted -cms\dr]-
trends: There have been no other sightings in Tijuana
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I looked up and saw about 8 or 9 Big glowing orange globes all connected by the structure that was mostly coverd by the clouds
